pairing_principles_reference.description: Core principles that guide all pairing episodes

principles.name: Umami Amplification
principles.rule: Sake's amino acids + food's glutamates = enhanced savory

principles.name: Fat Cutting
principles.rule: Sake's acidity and carbonation cleanse rich palates

principles.name: Temperature Matching
principles.rule: Warm sake with warm food, cold with cold or fried

principles.name: No Tannin Clash
principles.rule: Unlike wine, sake won't fight fish oils or delicate proteins

principles.name: Heat Taming
principles.rule: Cold sake with lower alcohol soothes spicy heat without amplifying it

principles.name: Grain Harmony
principles.rule: Rice-based sake naturally complements other grain-based dishes

principles.name: Fermentation Friends
principles.rule: Fermented sake pairs beautifully with other fermented foods
